entry.title: Book: Learning to learn
entry.content: While doing some research on Meta Learning, I came across the book of Radek Osmulski . The book is titled META LEARNING and basically reprots valuable information on how to become a deep learning scientist. It gives really personal advice to all those who want to become to use deep learning to have an impact on this field.
entry.summary: While doing some research on Meta Learning, I came across the book of Radek Osmulski . It gives really personal advice to all those who want to become to use deep learning to have an impact on this field.
